response.summary: Chemical Engineer with a Master's Degree in Environment and Development Studies. Trilingual (Spanish, English, and German). 6+ years of experience in Consulting for the industrial sector, leading processes in the fields of Climate Change, Circular Economy, Knowledge Management, and Research and Development. Outstanding international experience in sustainability projects with a focus on emerging economies. Strong knowledge in Environmental Impact Assessment, Sustainability Assessment, Environmental Policy, Ecological Economics and Economic Valuation of Environmental Goods and Services.
response.skills: Valoración del ciclo de vida, Evaluación de impacto ambiental, R, Microsoft Excel, Inglés académico, Alemán, Docencia universitaria, Enseñanza de idiomas, Presentaciones en conferencias, Elaboración de informes

profile_positions.description: Overall management and implementation of projects on estimation of corporate Greenhouse Gas emissions inventories, setting of emission reduction targets aligned with climate science, and formulation of decarbonization strategies for Colombian and international companies.
profile_positions.title: Climate Strategies Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Estimation, analysis, and report of the emissions from the industrial sector for the development of Colombia's national GHG inventory, in the framework of the Third Biennial Update Report (BUR3), presented to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC).

Project led by the Institute of Hydrology, Meteorology and Environmental Studies (IDEAM).
profile_positions.title: Climate Change Junior Consultant

profile_positions.description: Sustainability assessment of a circular economy model consisting of the production of 2nd generation biofuels from urban waste, in the framework of an industry-academia partnership project.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Research Assistant

profile_positions.description: Design and implementation of Knowledge Management and Technical Training Programs for the Colombian National Oil Company, in alignment with the Operational Excellence Model, which seeks to strengthen the corporative commitments in Health, Safety, and Environment.
profile_positions.title: Associate Engineer

company.name: Joint Institute of Advanced Materials and Processes (ZMP)

profile_positions.company: Joint Institute of Advanced Materials and Processes (ZMP)
profile_positions.description: Development of structured catalysts and performance studies for diesel hydrotreating, in the framework of a research project on environmental catalysis for the production of clean fuels.
profile_positions.title: Junior Research Assistant

profile_positions.description: Planning, logistics, and management of the course on Advanced Separation Operations. Continuous support to the international guests and tutoring to the course participants.
profile_positions.title: Tutor of the Advanced Separation Operations Course - 9th International Engineering Seminar

profile_positions.description: Analysis and processing of experimental data of biomass gasification studies at pilot-scale, in the framework of a waste-to-energy project.
profile_positions.title: Research and Development Intern

company.name: South Pole
company.description: South Pole has been at the forefront of decarbonization since 2006, developing and implementing comprehensive strategies that turn climate action into long-term business opportunities for Fortune 500 companies, governments and organizations around the world. South Pole is more than a leading consultancy, its team of 1,200+ experts have developed projects, as well as designed innovative tools across finance, climate action API's, and emission reductions & compensation strategies to help clients reach their carbon mitigation and Net Zero goals. To date South Pole has worked with over 1,000 clients, and channelled finance to over 850 projects through our 30+ offices globally. Our solutions have created tens of thousands of jobs in developing countries, hundreds of millions of dollars for business, improved brand value and better living and working conditions for countless people in vulnerable communities around the world.
